title: From Books to Petabytes: Building a Research and Learning Portal with MarkLogic
abstract:
Big Data is not just a challenge for business. Academic libraries struggle with managing the terabytes of data they acquire and generate as they engage in large-scale digitization projects and purchase large collections of digital content. This content includes not only electronic articles and books, but also digitized video and audio, geospatial resources, including vector and image data, and numeric statistical data.  
 
To deal with this new data challenge, academic libraries in Ontario, Canada, have pooled resources to build a new set of shared services for over 400,000 students and researchers called Scholars Portal. This session will describe how MarkLogic has become the core technology behind this new digital library.

surveys.comments: Great stuff but a little long, slightly too much content
